BookFile.Header:
Entry format
Num AJB_ID Author [and author [and …]] [ed.|comp.], Title, Place, Publisher, year, description, price, review [and review [and …]], comments
AJB_ID volume.section[(subsection)].entry, for example 68.144(1).25 would be volume 68, section 144, subsection 1, and entry number 25.
Commas are field separators for automatic parsing. Use the word ‘comma’ if you want the character in field string. We will use global search and replace after parsing into fields.
Save as Unicode UTF-8 text encoding. Skip section 2 in Part 1
For volume AJB ?43 Index to the Literature of 1941, started 24 Jan 2016, finished, proofread

Entry.Title: Photography by infrared, its principles and applications
Structure et propriétés des couches photographiques

Construction facile, économique et scientifique d'une lunette astronomique de débutant, permettant de voir destinctement las taches et facules du Soleil, les montagnes et cirques de la Lune, Jupiter et 4 satellites, Saturne et son splendide anneau, des millier d'etoiles, des nébuleuses, etc.
